example.code:
Get-DSSnapshot -DirectoryId d-123456ijkl
DirectoryId : d-123456ijkl Name : SnapshotId : s-9064bd1234 StartTime : 12/13/2019 6:33:01 PM Status : Completed Type : Auto
DirectoryId : d-123456ijkl Name : SnapshotId : s-9064bb4321 StartTime : 12/9/2019 9:48:11 PM Status : Completed Type : Auto
example.description: This command gets information about the specified directory snapshots that belong to this account.
